text:
e="preserve">Beverly A. "Bev" Clarno (born March 1936) is an American Republican politician. She is the 27th and current Oregon Secretary of State after being appointed on March 31, 2019 following Dennis Richardson's death. She became Speaker of the Oregon House of Representatives in 1995. She left the office on 1997.
Clarno was born in Langlois, Oregon.
